mapper.select:
select count(*) from ( SELECT *, TRIM(CONCAT(dom.dom_sido_nm, ' ', dom.dom_sgg_nm, ' ',dom.dom_emd_nm,' ',dom.dom_ri_nm, ' ', dom.dom_jibun)) AS address FROM dopco_master dom
WHERE 1 = 1
and dom.dom_jisa=#{jisa}
and dom.dom_jasan_no like '%${jasan_no}%'
and dom.dom_chuideuk_date::date between #{start_date}::date and #{end_date}::date
) r where 1=1
and r.address like '%${address}%'

select * ,concat(dom_sido_nm,' ',dom_sgg_nm,' ',dom_emd_nm,' ',dom_ri_nm,' ',dom_jibun) as address from dopco_master where 1=1
and dom_dopco_no=#{idx}
mapper.insert: Insert into DOPCO_TOJA ( dt_DOPCO_NO, dt_TOJA_NO ) Values ( #{DOPCO_NO},#{TOJA} )

Insert into DOPCO_RIGHT ( DOPCO_NO, RIGHT_NAME, RIGHT_MONEY
,RIGHT_DATE
,CANCLE_DATE
, RIGHT_UNAME, RIGHT_PHONE, RIGHT_ADDR ) Values ( #{DOPCO_NO},#{RIGHT_NAME},#{RIGHT_MONEY}
, TO_DATE(#{RIGHT_DATE}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
, TO_DATE(#{CANCLE_DATE}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
, #{RIGHT_UNAME},#{RIGHT_PHONE},#{RIGHT_ADDR} )
INSERT INTO DOPCO_ATCFILE(da_DOPCO_NO, da_SEQ , da_FILE_PATH, da_FILE_NM) VALUES (#{DOPCO_NO}, nextVal(dopco_atc_seq), #{FILE_PATH}, #{FILE_NM})
Insert into DOPCO_MODIFY ( dom_DOPCO_NO, dom_MODIFY_DATE, dom_GUBUN, dom_CONT, dom_USER_NAME, dom_USER_ID) Values (#{DOPCO_NO},Now(), #{GUBUN}, #{CONT}, #{USER_NAME}, #{USER_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(dom_DOPCO_NO FROM 3) AS INTEGER)), 0) AS NOW_DOPCONO FROM DOPCO_MASTER;
mapper.update: UPDATE DOPCO_MASTER SET dom_CANCLE_YN = 'Y' ,dom_CANCLE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{CANCLEDATE},'yyyy-mm-dd') ,dom_CANCLE_NAME = #{USERNAME} ,dom_CANCLE_EMPCD = #{EMPCD} WHERE dom_DOPCO_NO = #DOPCO_NO#
